item.title: UnitedHealthcare CEO shot dead at point-blank range, family speaks out
item.description: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson was shot near a Midtown Manhattan hotel in a potentially targeted shooting early Wednesday, according to police.

item.title: Trump disputes his DEA chief pick's withdrawing from consideration
item.description: Florida sheriff Chad Chronister announced Tuesday he was withdrawing his name from consideration to run the Drug Enforcement Agency.

item.title: California Democrat flips final House seat, dealing Republicans narrow majority

item.title: Boy, 7, fatally shoots 2-year-old brother after finding gun in glove box
item.description: A 7-year-old boy fatally shot his 2-year-old brother while sitting in a truck after finding a gun in the glove box, according to authorities in Califo...

item.title: Hegseth says he won't 'back down' as scrutiny grows over misconduct allegations
